excerpt: "If you are a VTuber fan, you may have noticed a surge of suspicious voice recordings on your feed over the last few days. New developments in AI voice synthesizers have given people the ability to reproduce shockingly accurate spoken recordings by only providing a few 30 to 60-second samples of a person’s speech."
